link.title: Braintree Public Schools
link.script:

div.style: background-size: cover; background-position: center center; background-image: url(https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/SCjzNY3Q3zSXZoNGk5DwfGQj7DuCWzzIRc02xXuAQ9dRMnFGFKppSqCfbVAMvFq34l8CbOVM=w16383);

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-OiUrBf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: On March 27th, Braintree Public Schools shared with Parents, Guardians, and Students that we would be transitioning to a more formal structure for remote learning given the new DESE guidance. Our Remote Learning Plans (RLP) for elementary and secondary students can be found within each schools page. The RLP was presented to the Braintree School Committee at their April 2nd meeting (view here).

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: With its asynchronous delivery model, our RLP provides for the flexibility we believe will be needed to maintain continuity of educational services to our families. Once again, thank you for your continued support and patience as we work to ensure a plan that is in the best interest of students, staff, and parents.

img.alt: Braintree Public Schools. Achieving. Creative. Inclusive.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: “For, in the final analysis, our most basic common link is that we all inhabit this small planet. We all breathe the same air. We all cherish our children’s future."

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: Follow Braintree Public Schools on Facebook and Twitter for updates
